ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T23:29:37 [Issue ID 4000-86837] urn:comicvine:4000-86837 urn:metron:issue/dark-horse-presents-1986-156/ Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:02:59. [Issue ID 213435]
ComicInfo.Summary: In the new series Witch's Son, Samuel has all the powers of a classic superhero and the desire to make the world a better place, but his mom's a witch (as in "wicked old") and wants him to use his powers for evil. Sons love their mothers, but a guy's gotta draw the line somewhere. But where? In "A Midsummer Night's Hunt," a dragon with a bounty on its head is the quarry, and a magician with a sportsman's heart is the hunter. But is the death of the dragon really the intended result? Or is there something more going on here? Malaysian comics artist Baba Chuah will dazzle you with his incredibly detailed art and beautiful storytelling.
ComicInfo.Title: Witch's Son; Clown Without Pity; A Midsummer Night's Hunt
ComicInfo.Writer: Scott Allie,Chris Warner,Ghee Hin Chuah,Scott Allie,Chris Warner,Ghee Hin Chuah
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ryan Sook,Chris Brunner,Ghee Hin Chuah,Ryan Sook,Chris Brunner,Ghee Hin Chuah
ComicInfo.Inker: Mick Gray,Chris Brunner,Ghee Hin Chuah,Mick Gray,Chris Brunner,Ghee Hin Chuah
